name: Startup Apps
desc: Control whcih applications launch automatically on login with this convenient built-in app.
author: Nautilus Labs and dinguschan

name: Task Manager
desc: Monitor and manage running applications and windows. View system statistics and close unresponsive apps with ease.
author: Nautilus Labs and dinguschan

name: Snap Manager
desc: Add window snapping with animated previews. Customize layouts, assign shortcuts, and drag to see live guides.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler

name: Ultraviolet
desc: Modern proxy technology, now on NautilusOS. Explore the web with a whole new set of limitless possibilities.
author: Nautilus Labs and hvtrs

name: Helios
desc: The classic CORS proxy you know and love, fit into Nautilus.
author: Nautilus Labs and dinguschan

name: Visual Studio Code
desc: VS Code is the developer's choice for text editing, coding, and everything in between. With VSC arriving to Nautilus, you can now code, edit, and more on the go.
author: Microsoft

name: V86 Emulator
desc: Run x86 operating systems and software inside NautilusOS. Experience virtualized computing with full system emulation.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler
